attributes.action: train police services in taking greater heed of warning signs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like many peaceful, law - abiding citizens, I am appalled by AOL reports that more than 1,000 people were warned by police last year that they were the subject of a murder plot. 

Senior officers across the country issued so-called Osman warnings to businessmen, drug dealers and gang members after receiving specific intelligence that they were at serious risk of being killed by individuals with the resources to arrange their death.

Likewise, death threats, scuffles and skirmishes are often a prelude to more serious crimes - which often go either unreported or not acted upon. Please do something about this, PM.

When he was arrested, Paget-Lewis said: “Why didn’t you stop me before I did it, I gave you all the warning signs?”

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
